# Are you ready to scrape NFL QBs with Pandas?

We are going to use Pandas to pull in tables from a URL. 
In this case we will grab NFL Passing Data for 2020!

![nfl qbs cartoon](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DuQCqbyW4AAG4RX?format=jpg&name=large)
source.75f94172: This means there is one table on the page. To display that first table you insert a 0.

Use the read_html method of the Pandas library to read the HTML tables

This script returns HTML tables into a list of DataFrame objects
